VirtualHost:
xmlns:www.example.com="http://schemas.android.com/tools"> xmlns:www.example.com="http://schemas.android.com/tools"> ServerName www.example.com
SSLEngine on SSLCertificateKeyFile /etc/apache2/ssl/www.example.com.key SSLCertificateFile /etc/apache2/ssl/www.example.com.cert SetEnvIf User-Agent ".*MSIE.*" nokeepalive ssl-unclean-shutdown
